text: Vladimir Mendelssohn (29 November 1949 â€“ 13 August 2021) was a Romanian composer, violist, and professor. He was Director of the Kuhmo Chamber Music Festival from 2005 until his death. Mendelssohn was born in Bucharest, Romania. He also composed the movie scores for Darclee and The Violin Player. Mendelssohn died on 13 August 2021, aged 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Romanian composers Category:Violinists Category:Romanian academics Category:People from Bucharest
title: Vladimir Mendelssohn
